name: Bran Muffins
steps: Pour boiling water over bran cereal and set aside. Mix sugar with melted shortening then beat in eggs and buttermilk.
Add wet bran mixture. Combine flour, cereal, baking soda and salt. Stir into liquid mixture (this thickens as it stands)
You may add chopped dates, apples, nuts or prunes. Put in a container allowing room for the batter to expand. Keep in refrigerator. Bake at 350 for 12-15 min.
